Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: We have successfully sent a proposal transaction of 'invoke' to chaincode_example02 where it will transfer a value from one account to another. The peer debug log is showing the GET_STATE is running. We are now looking at decoding the results that are returned.

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: We are only working with a single peer. Collection up the results from many peers has just been started.
